oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge certificate for Union Pvt. Samuel W. Duncan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Completed form identifies the trooper as Pvt. Samuel W. Duncan, Co. M, 7th Penn. Cav. Regt. He was discharged from the Army at Macon, Georgia, on August 23, 1864, when he was 20 years old. The document identifies his height, complexion type, and; eye color. It was given at Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, on September 12, 1865. Duncan was born in Armstrong County, Pennsylvania.
